title: "Public Comment on Proposed Rules and Forms for CARE Act"
excerpt: "Human Rights Watch has carefully reviewed the eleven rules of court and eleven forms proposed to implement the newly enacted Community Assistance, Recovery, and Empowerment (CARE) Act and writes to respectfully oppose their content and the process and procedures created by them."
